text: The men's 400 metres hurdles event at the 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Amsterdam, Netherlands, at Olympisch Stadion on 13 and 14 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Matthew Elias ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Periklis Iakovakis ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Mikael Jakobsson ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 14 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
